backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that exposes a single public function returning a hardcoded canister ID string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three features related to replacing Barnali Chakraborty's profile image with cache-busting and draft deployment verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing detailed summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, configuration, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app with favicon, viewport meta tags, and references to the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full page layout with Navigation, Hero, AboutUs, CoreTeam, Products, FarmerSupport, Contact, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component displaying company story, team image, and four value cards highlighting women empowerment, quality, social impact, and natural goodness.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section with three cards showing address, email addresses, and phone number with proper mailto/tel links and a call-to-action message.
frontend/src/components/CoreTeam.tsx: Core Team section displaying four team member profiles with aggressive cache-busting via timestamps, unique filenames, and useEffect DOM manipulation for founder, operations lead, and product lead images.
frontend/src/components/DnsConfiguration: Component providing DNS configuration instructions (content truncated in source).
frontend/src/components/FarmerSupport.ts: React component displaying Milletmist's farmer support program with impact cards showing direct partnership, sustainable income, training, and community building initiatives. Includes a hero section with farmer imagery and descriptive text about empowering ultra-poor farmers.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Raavni Agrobyte branding, copyright information, and attribution link to caffeine.ai. Includes company logo and dynamic year display.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, Raavni Agrobyte logo, headline text about health and impact, feature pills for natural millets/women-led/farmer support, and CTA buttons to explore products and learn about the story.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with scroll detection, mobile menu toggle, and smooth scrolling to sections (home, about, team, products, farmer-support, contact). Highlights active section based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Products showcase component displaying two millet-based products (Protein Bar and Energy Boost) with images, descriptions, and benefit badges. Includes a section highlighting general millet health and sustainability benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an actor instance for backend communication, using Internet Identity for authentication. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides login, logout, and status tracking functionality with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a React Query hook `useCanisterId` that fetches the canister ID from the actor when available and not currently fetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm earth-tone color palette (terracotta, sage, amber) for light and dark modes, custom fonts (Inter, Playfair Display), and gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color system, typography plugins, custom animations (accordion, fade-in, slide-up), and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking three features for replacing Barnali Chakraborty's team profile image with cache-busting and draft deployment, including image processing requirements to match existing team photo dimensions (400x400).
